item.title: Fedora 22 使用体验不错

item.description: 下面是随手的几个截图。 一部分F22新功能评测在这里http://fedoramagazine.org/whats-new-fedora-22

item.title: Microserver Lenovo ThinkCenter M92/M92p Tiny
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 刚刚入手了一台 Lenovo ThinkCenter M92/M92p Tiny测试机，虽然配置不高但是出于geek习惯，还是要动动螺丝刀的。下面是拆机过程，供参考。 [gallery columns=“2” link=“file” ids=“52429,52430,52431,52432,52433,52434,52435”] 这款机器目前在国内

item.title: What's Google Chrome OS
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 看完这个视频之后，还是没搞清楚：它到是一个快速的浏览器，还是一个快速启动的OS加浏览器，如果它仍然需要OS的话，那么它不过是一个Redesi

item.title: gOS looks green
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Today I installed gOS on my laptop; openSuSE did great work for me 3 years. I’d like to play some new things. So, check my new desktop out.http://picasaweb.google.com/liuzh66/GOSIf you go its wetsite http://thinkgos.com/, you will see it talks lots of cloud. It’s interesting, but it is not the reson i chose it. Ubuntu 8.04 is inside gOS. So, it time to learn a new linux system. I neve use a Derbin based system, I’m not sure it could run for me how long.
